modName: Tutorial - How to Add Voice Files
summary: Images showing steps to adding voice files for NPC voicing.
descriptionHtml:
I have been asked a few times how for help in creating custom-voiced followers, and made these pictures for someone, and I decided to post them on Nexus. I have noticed several companion modders making mistakes that are easily avoided if you take proper care. This can ensure that your mod runs smoothly and does not conflict with others.

There are a few videos on Creation Kit Youtube channel showing this process. These images show a few additional key steps and details.

If you find these tutorials helpful, please come back and ENDORSE. Thank you.
[size=3]
Want to learn more about modding Skyrim? Â I have a book on Amazon:
[b][color=#00ffff]"Newbies Guide to Modding Skyrim: Tips & Tricks for the Creation Kit."[/color][/b]
See this [url=https://annafollowers.wordpress.com/books/modding-book-review-by-urshi/]nice review by Urshi[/url], and [url=https://annafollowers.wordpress.com/books/modding-book-review-by-urshi/]more info and buy links too[/url].[/size]
author: Anduniel
